articles.title: Video: Liz Cheney hints at political career past 2022 in CNN interview - CNN Video
articles.description: Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney faces an uphill battle in her August primary race. In today's episode of The Point, CNN's Chris Cillizza breaks down Cheney's recent interview with CNN's Jake Tapper and how the anti-Trump Republican is positioning herself for the futu…

articles.title: Video: Nord Stream 1 makes Europe more reliant on Russian gas. Here's why - CNN Video
articles.description: Nord Stream 1, the biggest single pipeline supplying Europe with Russian gas, has resumed operation after a planned maintenance. CNN's Clare Sebastian explains why the pipeline is so important.

articles.author: Natasha Bertrand, CNN
articles.title: US officials say 'biggest fear' has come true as Russia cuts gas supplies to Europe
articles.description: The Biden administration is working furiously behind the scenes to keep European allies united against Russia as Moscow further cuts its energy supplies to the European Union, prompting panic on both sides of the Atlantic over potentially severe gas shortages…

articles.author: Michelle Watson, CNN
articles.title: Third set of human remains found at Lake Mead amid drought, National Park Service says
articles.description: Another set of human remains was found at Lake Mead Monday as the reservoir's water levels continue to recede, according to a news release from the National Park Service.
articles.content:

articles.author: Uliana Pavlova and Kristin Fisher, CNN
articles.title: Russia says it will quit the International Space Station after 2024
articles.description: Russia says it is planning to pull out of the International Space Station and end its decades-long partnership with NASA at the orbiting outpost, according to the newly appointed head of Russia's space agency.

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: 'Edge of a global recession': IMF slashes world economic forecast again
articles.description: The global economy is already in trouble, yet risks keep piling up.

articles.author: Anna Cooban
articles.title: The EU has agreed to ration gas, but some countries put up a fight
articles.description: The European Union has agreed to ration its natural gas this winter to prevent a severe supply shock. But the bloc has watered down its ambitions by offering countries some significant leeway.
articles.content:

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: The inside story of how John Roberts failed to save abortion rights
articles.description: It appears unlikely that Roberts' best prospect -- Justice Brett Kavanaugh -- was ever close to switching his earlier vote.

articles.author: Benjamin Taubman, CNN Business
articles.title: Why diesel is more expensive than regular gas
articles.description: Diesel is crucial to international transportation and its price has a major impact on the US economy. There are three primary reasons for its higher price tag than regular gasoline.

articles.author: By Kathleen Magramo, Adrienne Vogt, Mike Hayes and Maureen Chowdhury, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Vital grain shipments from Ukraine are expected to resume within the next few days, according to the UN, under a deal cast into doubt by Russian strikes on the port of Odesa just a day after it was signed. Follow live news updates here.
